p: Commercial and in-house ELISAs were used in the majority of articles (94/126 [74.6%]). Virus neutralisation tests (VNTs) were used in a total of 32/126 articles (25.4%). In 17 of these 32 articles (53.1%) VNTs were used as a confirmatory test for the ELISAs, often only testing a subset of the samples.
